item.title: Evented vs Threaded
item.description: Evented vs Threaded On this post I talk about the main differences between the Threaded and the Evented models and how they work by doing an analogy of a real situation that easy explains both models. The Threaded model’s analogy is about a bank and how the people is assigned to a cashier, if the cashiers are busy then the people will start to queue, so this is how the resources are blocked, until a cashier is free to atend a person, that resource or thread is blocked.
